column1: In April 2011, Don Balka and Jane Porath completed their term as members of the MTMS Editorial Panel. Don has served on the panel for a generous five years, and Jane has dedicated her third year on the Panel to chair responsibilities. These two editors worked hard on the April 2011  Focus Issue titled “Connecting Algebra and Geometry in the Middle Grades.” Their contributions and dedication have been invaluable.

The departments in MTMS are always well received by readers, for which much of the credit goes to the dedicated department editors. The role of editor often involves more than editing the work that comes in from outside sources; in many instances, it involves recruiting writers or even  writing the material. We wish to recognize Peggy House and Stephen P. Smith, coeditors of the popular “Cartoon Corner,” and Gwen Johnson and James Dogby, who work on “Mathematical Explorations.” We also thank Hamp  Sherard, editor of “Quick Reads,” and David Rock and Mary K. Porter, who continue to provide variety each month in the “Palette of Problems.” Edward S. Mooney and Sherry Meier shepherd the “Solve It!” and “Solve It! Student Thinking” departments; Debra Johanning is  responsible for “Informing Practice”; and Erik Tillema  contributes his time for “Math for Real.” The Editorial Panel and NCTM are grateful for their numerous contributions to MTMS.
